parallelComputingLib
Class UDPListen

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      parallelComputingLib.UDPListen
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, NetworkListener
public class UDPListen
extends java.lang.Thread
implements NetworkListener

Title: UDPListen

Description: This class allows multiple objects to listen for data with a single channel. Callback event model used. To use this class implement UDPListener and override NetworkEventOccured(NetworkEvent e){} with custom code. Then startup UDPListen and register your class to listen for events.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chris Holcombe

listener - NetworkListener Any class that implements NetworkListener

run

public void run()
This is the main method of the class and all network IO is processed here. This sends network events to all registered listeners.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

getChannel

public java.nio.channels.DatagramChannel getChannel()
Utility method used to obtain the channel this class is using for UDP.

Returns:
DatagramChannel Returns the class channel.

setup

public void setup()
This method takes care of setting up all channels and buffers for UDP operation. This method should be called first after creating any new UDP listeners.
